title: How are we going to change in the next 10 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am 56 at present, in 10 years time I will be 86. That’s how fast the aging happens, IMO. The future depends on a lot of factors, but at some point catabolism overtakes anabolism.

In management we have this concept called MBO - management by objectives. Unity of direction is another. So if we all citizens abide by it & perform our individual roles flawlessly, we would be doing a lot good to the society & contributing directly or indirectly towards country’s welfare & growth.
